## Color3.equalsFloats() method

Determines equality between the current Color3 object and a set of r,b,g values

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
equalsFloats(r: number, g: number, b: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  r | <code>number</code> | defines the red component to check |
|  g | <code>number</code> | defines the green component to check |
|  b | <code>number</code> | defines the blue component to check |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`

true if the rgb values are equal to the given ones
